com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto

Class ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base.IdentifiableDto
      • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base.IdentifiableFieldValueDto
        • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDto, ReadOnlyDto, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto
extends IdentifiableFieldValueDto
implements ReadOnlyDto
    A filter for referenced/referring items (with a specific status) in another tracker that should be updated upon a state transition.
    Since:
    CB-6.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto(IdentifiableDto tracker, java.lang.Integer statusId, TrackerLayoutLabelDto field, boolean outgoing, UserDto user)
      Create an ForeignTrackerItemUpdateFilter for items with the specified status in the specified tracker, that are referenced by/referring to the current item via the specified field (depending on outgoing).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto

        public ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto()

      • ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto

        public ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto(IdentifiableDto tracker,
                           java.lang.Integer statusId,
                           TrackerLayoutLabelDto field,
                           boolean outgoing,
                           UserDto user)
        Create an ForeignTrackerItemUpdateFilter for items with the specified status in the specified tracker, that are referenced by/referring to the current item via the specified field (depending on outgoing). The update should be executed with the specified user's permissions.
        Parameters:
        tracker - is the tracker where to update items
        statusId - is the status of the items to update
        field - is the reference field that defines the connection between the current item and the referenced/referring items
        outgoing - true for an outgoing reference, false for an incoming reference
        user - is the (admin) user that configured this referenced/referring item update and that will be used to run the update

      • ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto

        public ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto(ForeignTrackerItemFilterDto filter)
        Create a shallow copy of a ForeignTrackerItemUpdateFilter
        Parameters:
        filter - to copy

      • isOutgoing

        public boolean isOutgoing()
        Check the this is an outgoing reference, where (getField() is a reference field of the current item, or an incoming reference, where (getField() is a reference field of the foreign items
        Returns:
        true for an outgoing reference, false for an incoming reference
